page.title: 17FARMS.
page.content: CORNISH HALL (map ref:684357) and WHITLEYS (686362) are farmed by one family,employing 4 men,acreage 586, crops: barley,peas,beans,rape also grassland for grazing & hay. Livestock:29 cattle,803 pigs,110 sheep and l86 chickens. {JEKYLLS FARM}(691357)is a family farm, acreage:164,crops: Wheat.Livestock:4 cattle,10 pigs,and a few chickens. {ROOK HALL}(684349) is a family farm, acreage: 180,crops:wheat,barley & rape {YELDHAMS}(699349) OBOURNES (693345) & {ELMS (705356)}Farms are farmed by father & son.employing 1 man,acreage 360 in total.Crops: Wheat,Barley,peas rape and mustard.Livestock: 45 Sheep. {At Obournes}there is a ruin of a Tudor dove cote.It is the possible site of a large house and stud farm. {HOLE FARM}(697364) acreage 291,crops: barley,oats,wheat and hay.No livestock
